notesStmt.note: Purports to be the twenty-fifth chapter (adhyāya) of a part (khaṇḍa), perhaps the fifth, of the Sāmbasadāśivapurāṇa, which the ms. claims is the same as Bhaviṣyottarapurāṇa. Title from colophon.
Good condition. Fourth leaf colored yellow. Mistakes covered over with yellow. A few marginal corrections.
Begins (f. 1r): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ. ravir uvāca. devadevajagatāṁ pate vibho bhargābhīma bhava candrabhūṣaṇa bhūtanātha bhavabhītihāraka tvānnato smi natavāṁchitaprada (verse 1).
Colophon (f. 4r): iti śrīsāmbasadāśivapurāṇe bhaviṣyottara* p* khaṇḍe pañcaviṁśatimodhyāyaḥ. śrīsāvārapaṇam astu. śubhaṁ bhavatu. sābhāraṁpaṇam astu.
